summary:
ASEAN is a group of 10 countries in Southeast Asia working together for a better future. These countries have over 600 million people and a huge area of land. They focus on making the region stronger economically, socially, and culturally. ASEAN also wants to keep the peace and make sure everyone follows the rules.

This alliance is important because its member countries are growing quickly, and it helps with cooperation in the Asia-Pacific and worldwide. ASEAN's work has led to big trade agreements, making it a key player in global connections.
title: ASEAN
